name: arc-helper
title: Arc Helper
description: Search items, quests, events, and traders for Arc Raiders
author: pcho

commands.name: search-arcs
commands.title: Search ARCs
commands.subtitle: Arc Helper
commands.description: Browse ARC enemies and their descriptions

commands.name: search-quests
commands.title: Search Quests
commands.subtitle: Arc Helper
commands.description: Browse Arc Raiders quests with requirements and rewards

commands.name: event-timers
commands.title: Event Timers
commands.subtitle: Arc Helper
commands.description: View current and upcoming Arc Raiders events

commands.name: open-map
commands.title: Open Map
commands.subtitle: Arc Helper
commands.description: Open Arc Raiders interactive maps in browser

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
